name: leointeg
displayName: Leo Editor Integration with Visual Studio Code
description: Use Leo, the literate editor with outline, directly in vscode.

leoIntegration.checkForChangeExternalFil.description: Set default for checking changes to external files

leoIntegration.defaultReloadIgnore.description: Set default for derived files to always reload, or always ignore, when changes are detected

leoIntegration.leoTreeBrowse.description: Specifies whether to use Leo's style of tree browsing with the arrow keys

leoIntegration.treeKeepFocus.description: Specifies whether to keep focus in the outline when selecting a node - overridden by "leoTreeBrowse"

leoIntegration.treeKeepFocusWhenAside.description: Specifies whether to keep focus in the outline when opening a body pane on the side

leoIntegration.statusBarString.description: Sets the message string of the Status Bar Indicator

leoIntegration.statusBarColor.description: Specifies the hexadecimal color string for the Status Bar Indicator

leoIntegration.treeInExplorer.description: Show the outline tree in the explorer view

leoIntegration.showOpenAside.description: Offer 'Open to the Side' in nodes context menu

leoIntegration.showEditOnNodes.description: Shows 'Edit Headline' button on tree nodes

leoIntegration.showArrowsOnNodes.description: Shows 'Move Node' arrow buttons on tree nodes

leoIntegration.invertNodeContrast.description: Inverts the contrast of the dirty/clean border aspect of tree nodes

leoIntegration.leoServerPath.description: Specifies the location of the Leo server script

leoIntegration.leoPythonCommand.description: Specifies the command to start python (Defaults to 'py' on windows and 'python3' otherwise)

leoIntegration.startServerAutomatically.description: Starts a LeoBridge server automatically, by running the Leo server script

leoIntegration.connectToServerAutomatica.description: Connect automatically to a Leo server on specified 'Connection Port' upon activation of this extension
